Sentencas: High-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) technology has great potential as a clean and effective energy source.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: However, several issues have prevented their widespread adoption, like high operating costs, difficulty integrating with other components, and being sensitive to fuel contamination.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: In order to address these challenges, the main novelties of the present work are carbon capture and utilization for clean energy production, using the flue gas condensation process as a cost-effective and energy-efficient strategy, and the combination of Molten Carbonate Fuel Cells (MCFC) for increased energy efficiency and most effective component integration.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: The proposed novel system is also equipped with a gasifier and vanadium chloride unit for syngas and clean hydrogen production.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: The system's practicality is evaluated by analyzing the key performance indicators from thermodynamic, exergo-economic, exergo-environmental, and sustainability viewpoints.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: Also, the Sankey diagram is presented to investigate each component's effectiveness from the exergy destruction facet.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: According to the findings, at the most optimum design condition, the acceptable energy and exergy efficiencies of 61.06% and 50.66%, respectively, are achieved, revealing the system's effectiveness.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: The suggested system is also financially attractive since it achieves a reasonable levelized power cost of 17.6
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process
The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: The findings show that carbon dioxide recovery is crucial in reducing the pollutants due to the low emission index of 5.01 kg/GWh.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process

Sentencas: Finally, the exergo-environmental index, environmental damage effectiveness, and exergy stability factor have equivalent values of 0.012, 0.59, and 0.54.
Titulo: The optimal design of solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells integration with a CO2 recycling unit: An attempt to reach a clean transition process
